title: Hostile Space Pirates
text:
You run afoul of a group of space pirates on their way to plunder other hapless
spacefarers like yourself 
 
How do you proceed?

options.text: Attack the brigands!

possibleOutcomes.text:
Victory! You destroyed them and claimed their fuel as yours.

Onward, to the stars!

A valiant attempt but they straight-up SMOKED you. 

Like, it wasn't even close

AND they stole your fuel! Jerks.

options.text: Maybe we can talk it out?

possibleOutcomes.text:
Against all odds, the marauders could be reasoned with!

They even shared their resources with you. 

How kind-hearted of those filthy space rats!

Diplomacy was... not effective.

Like a bully stealing lunch money from the nerdy kid in an 80s movie, they stole your fuel. 

And your dignity.

Diplomacy was... not effective.

They stole your fuel, like a bully stealing lunch money from a nerd in an 80s movie.

title: Alien Nation
text:
You come across a planet populated by a species you've never seen before!

These creatures must be. . .

options.text: Destroyed!

possibleOutcomes.text:
You wipe out the nascent civilization and plunder their planet's meager resources

Kind of a dick move, honestly. 

And so unnecessary! Have you considered therapy?

options.text: Befriended!

possibleOutcomes.text:
Turns out, violence WASN'T the answer!

They share their meager resources with you in a stunning display of 
interplanetary generosity.

options.text: Ignored!

possibleOutcomes.text:
You avoid them. 

 . . . that's it.

How narratively unsatisfying.

title: Multiple Ore Chasms
text:
Glistening caverns cover the nearby planet's surface.

Exploring these crevices may yield untold riches - or be a waste of time and energy.

How do you proceed?

options.text: Dive in with reckless abandon

possibleOutcomes.text:
Your eagerness pays off and the crew experiences multiple ore chasms.

No mutiny for these folks!

options.text: Maybe I'll explore the opening a little, just to see how it feels

possibleOutcomes.text:
There were orbs of varying shades of blue, but no ore chasms.

How anti-climactic!

options.text: I think I'll just watch

possibleOutcomes.text: Hey, different strokes for different folks - you do you, buddy.

title: Finger On The Pulsar
text:
Your ship comes dangerously close to a hyper-energetic pulsar.

You might be able to use its emissions for fuel...

What do you do?

options.text: Get a closer look

possibleOutcomes.text: A beautiful view, but sadly not a source of fuel.

options.text: Send a message back to earth

possibleOutcomes.text:
Nobody back home was listening. 

Disappointing, but not surprising, I suppose...

options.text: Wait and see

possibleOutcomes.text:
After some time, the pulsar's energy emissions dissipate.

You can continue your journey unharmed.

title: Black Hole Encounter
text: You encounter a massive black hole. What do you do?

options.text: Approach the black hole for research

possibleOutcomes.text: Your ship gets too close and is pulled into the black hole, leading to certain doom.
Your research yields valuable data about the black hole without risking your ship.

options.text: Maintain a safe distance and observe

possibleOutcomes.text: You make groundbreaking observations about the black hole's behavior from a safe distance.
Your ship's systems are affected by the black hole's gravitational forces, causing minor damage.

options.text: Flee from the black hole

possibleOutcomes.text: You FUELfully escape the black hole's gravitational pull and avoid any harm.
Escaping the black hole is challenging and results in minor damage to your ship.

title: Landing on a Mysterious Planet
text: You discover an uncharted planet. What do you do?

options.text: Land on the planet and explore

possibleOutcomes.text: You find a wealth of valuable resources on the planet's surface.
Your spaceship encounters turbulence during landing, causing minor damage.

options.text: Observe the planet from orbit

possibleOutcomes.text: You detect unusual energy signatures on the planet's surface, prompting further investigation.
Your observations from orbit reveal nothing of interest.

options.text: Leave the planet and continue your journey

possibleOutcomes.text: You depart without incident and continue your exploration of space.
As you leave the planet, your ship experiences a minor technical malfunction.

title: Asteroid Field Encounter
text: You enter a dense asteroid field. What do you do?

options.text: Navigate carefully through the asteroid field

possibleOutcomes.text: Your skillful navigation allows you to pass through the asteroid field unscathed.
Despite your best efforts, your ship sustains minor damage from asteroid impacts.

options.text: Use onboard systems to clear a path

possibleOutcomes.text: Your onboard systems effectively clear a safe path through the asteroid field.
Your systems malfunction, and attempting to clear the path causes minor damage.

options.text: Change course and avoid the asteroid field

possibleOutcomes.text: You change course and safely bypass the asteroid field without any issues.
Your course change is abrupt and results in minor damage to your ship's systems.

title: Exploring an Abandoned Space Station
text: You come across an abandoned space station. What do you do?

options.text: Dock with the space station and explore its interior

possibleOutcomes.text: You find valuable technology and supplies inside the space station.
The space station's interior is unstable, and your ship sustains minor damage during docking.

options.text: Scan the space station from a distance

possibleOutcomes.text: Your scans reveal hidden compartments with useful resources on the space station.
Your scans do not detect anything remarkable about the space station.

options.text: Ignore the space station and continue your journey

possibleOutcomes.text: You decide to move on, and your journey continues without incident.
As you depart, your ship experiences a minor technical glitch.

title: Encounter with Space Pirates
text: You encounter a group of space pirates. What do you do?

options.text: Engage the pirates in combat

possibleOutcomes.text: Your combat skills prevail, and you defeat the space pirates, securing valuable loot.
The battle is intense, and your ship sustains moderate damage in the process.

options.text: Attempt to negotiate with the pirates

possibleOutcomes.text: Your negotiation skills convince the pirates to accept FUELs and spare your ship.
Negotiations fail, and the pirates attack your ship, causing moderate damage.

options.text: Evade the pirates and flee

possibleOutcomes.text: Your evasive maneuvers allow you to escape the space pirates without any harm.
While evading, your ship sustains minor damage from enemy fire.

title: Unexpected Meteor Shower
text: Your spaceship encounters a sudden meteor shower. What do you do?

options.text: Activate the ship's shields and navigate through the meteor shower

possibleOutcomes.text: Your shields hold up, and you fully navigate through the meteor shower unharmed.
Despite your shields, some meteors breach and cause minor damage to your ship.

options.text: Try to divert the meteor shower using ship's technology

possibleOutcomes.text: Your quick thinking and technology usage divert the meteor shower FUELfully.
Your attempt to divert the meteors causes minor damage to your ship's systems.

options.text: Wait it out and hope for the best

possibleOutcomes.text: The meteor shower subsides, and your ship remains unharmed.
While waiting, some meteors strike your ship, causing minor damage.

title: Exploration of a Gas Giant's Moon
text: You decide to explore one of the moons of a gas giant. What do you do?

options.text: Land on the moon and collect samples

possibleOutcomes.text: You find unique and valuable minerals while collecting samples.
Your landing is rough, causing minor damage to your spaceship.

options.text: Deploy drones to gather data from the moon's surface

possibleOutcomes.text: Your drones capture valuable data about the moon's geological features.
The drone deployment reveals no significant findings.

options.text: Decide to stay in orbit and observe from the ship

possibleOutcomes.text: Your decision to stay in orbit allows you to continue your journey without incidents.
While in orbit, your ship's systems experience a minor malfunction.

title: Encounter with an Interstellar Anomaly
text: You come across a mysterious interstellar anomaly. What do you do?

options.text: Investigate the anomaly up close

possibleOutcomes.text: You gather unique scientific data from the anomaly, enhancing your knowledge.
Approaching the anomaly causes minor damage to your ship's sensors.

options.text: Analyze the anomaly from a distance using advanced equipment

possibleOutcomes.text: Your analysis from a distance yields valuable insights into the anomaly's nature.
Despite your advanced equipment, no remarkable data is obtained.

options.text: Decide to change course and avoid the anomaly

possibleOutcomes.text: You change course and continue your journey without encountering any issues.
As you change course, your ship experiences a minor technical malfunction.

title: Asteroid Mining Operation
text: You find a rich asteroid field suitable for mining. What do you do?

options.text: Begin mining operations on the largest asteroid

possibleOutcomes.text: Your mining operation yields a valuable haul of minerals and resources.
During mining, an unexpected asteroid collision damages your mining equipment.

options.text: Deploy mining drones to collect resources from multiple asteroids

possibleOutcomes.text: Your mining drones gather a diverse range of valuable resources from the asteroids.
The mining drones do not uncover any remarkable resources in the selected asteroids.

options.text: Abandon the asteroid mining operation and continue your journey

possibleOutcomes.text: You decide to move on and continue your exploration without any issues.
As you leave the asteroid field, your ship experiences a minor technical glitch.
